extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access to Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Implement appropriate mechanisms to protect network access to devices, following Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security and product manuals.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure control system devices and systems are not accessible from the internet. Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). Ensure VPNs are updated to the most recent version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, following CISA's guidance and best practices.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
